source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_00<tab>Skribyld requires assistance with an ongoing investigation.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_00<tab>エールポートのスクリビルドは、冒険者に依頼があるようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_01<tab>Skribyld explains to you the growing threat of coeurls still roaming the lands around Aleport. Fearful for the local populace, Skribyld feels there is no other choice but to exterminate the remaining coeurls. You are to head to Skull Valley and carry out this grievous task.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_01<tab>スクリビルドの依頼を受けた。スカルバレー付近で「クァール」を捜そう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_02<tab>You locate a coeurl, but find she has been slain by a pack of jackals, leaving behind a defenseless newborn. As you ponder what is to be done with the kitten, you are set upon by a pair of the grisly jackals. You defeat them with your usual flourish, but the question of how to care for the baby coeurl remains. Approach him with gentleness to see what comfort you might provide.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_02<tab>クァールを発見した。スカルバレー付近にいる「クァールの幼獣」を「救助」しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_03<tab>To your surprise, the baby coeurl immediately warms to your presence. Take him back to Skribyld and report your findings.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_03<tab>クァールの幼獣を救助した。エールポートの「スクリビルド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_04<tab>Although relieved to hear the coeurls running rampant in Aleport are no more, Skribyld is saddened by the loss of life and the now orphaned baby coeurl. Rather than leave him to fend for himself in the wilderness, Skribyld insists that you look after him, that he may grow to become a friend to man.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SEQ_04<tab>スクリビルドに報告した。問題のクァールがすでに死んでいたことを伝えると、彼は少し安堵していた。遺されたクァールの幼獣は、冒険者が責任を持って人を襲わないよう育ててほしいとスクリビルドは言った。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_TODO_00<tab>Search for coeurls in Skull Valley.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_TODO_00<tab>スカルバレー付近でクァールを捜す
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_TODO_01<tab>クァールの幼獣を救助する

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_000<tab>Now then, we need to do something about the coeurls running wild in Vylbrand.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_000<tab>さて、野に放たれた狼犬についてだけど……
問題は、やつらの狙っているクァールのほうだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_001<tab>Jackals have greatly reduced their numbers, but the presence of coeurls will upset the balance of predation in Aleport. Given time, they will establish a breeding population, and perhaps even prey upon more than just animals.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_001<tab>狼犬に狙われ続けて、クァールは追い詰められている。
もはや、クァールの敵意は狼犬だけでなく、
けしかけた海賊……いや、人間にも向けられているんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_002<tab>A large number of merchants, sailors, and travelers pass through Aleport daily, meaning a great many people will be at risk unless we stop the coeurls here and now.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_002<tab>そんなクァールを、このまま放置しておくわけにはいかない。
市民が襲われでもしたら、どうなることか。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_003<tab>As much as it pains me to say this, they must be done away with. I like this no more than you, but we Yellowjackets must put the safety of the people above all else.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_003<tab>こうなった以上、早急にクァールは処分しなければならない。
ぼくらイエロージャケットの使命は、市民を守ること。
時には非情な決断だって、しなくちゃダメなんだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_004<tab>Reports indicate that coeurls were last sighted somewhere in Skull Valley. When you are ready, pray seek them out and do what needs be done.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_004<tab>どうか、きみの力を貸してくれ。
「スカルバレー」付近にいまだに潜伏しているはずの
クァールを見つけ出し、退治してほしい。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>The baby coeurl looks at you affectionately.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>クァールの幼獣は外敵から守ってくれた冒険者のことを、
親だと思っているようだ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_030<tab>Welcome back, adventurer. How did you fare against the coeurls in Skull Valley?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_030<tab>どうしたんだい、冒険者さん？
「スカルバレー」のクァールは退治できたのかい？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_031<tab>I see... So this baby coeurl is all that remains. It is truly a shame it came to this.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_031<tab>そうか……クァールは、もう力尽きていたのか。
そして、このクァールの幼獣を遺したんだね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_032<tab>Most of the jackals died fighting against coeurls, but it would seem you slew the pirates' last litter while saving this one. Let us at least take solace in knowing the bloodshed has ended.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_032<tab>狼犬たちも、ほとんどがクァールに殺されている。
幼獣を狙っていた狼犬が、きっと群れの最後のやつらだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_033<tab>There is a bit of good news to be had, however. I received word not long ago that a group of pirates related to our investigation was taken into custody.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_033<tab>この一件に関わった海賊は検挙できたけど、
たくさんの血は流れたし、後味は悪い事件だったね……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_034<tab>To instigate such carnage without scruple... The true animals in this case have been placed behind bars. With any luck, their leader and remaining members will join them shortly.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_034<tab>でもこれで、クァールと狼犬の不毛な争いは、
ようやく収束しそうだ。
きみの協力あってのことだ、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_035<tab>But what to do with this baby coeurl? He seems quite fond of you, almost as if you were his <var 08 E905 ((mother)) ((father)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_035<tab>……残る問題は、このクァールの幼獣だね。
どうやらこの子、きみにすごく懐いてるみたいだ。
親を亡くしたばかりだから、すがっているのかもね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_036<tab>Hmmm...the Yellowjackets are not fit to care for a coeurl, especially when full grown. But we cannot simply release him back into the wilds. I suppose there is only one option.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_036<tab>危険はなさそうに見えても、クァールはクァールなんだよな。
かといって、こんな小さな命を手にかけるのは心が痛む。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_037<tab>Friend, I leave this baby coeurl in your capable hands. I'm sure you will do what's best for him.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA158_01291_SKRIBYLD_000_037<tab>……よし、決めたよ。
きみを信じて、きみにこのクァールの幼獣を預ける。
この子が間違いを犯さないよう、きみが育ててくれ。
